meanings.definition: To promote or advertise (something) as being very good or desirable.
meanings.sent1: The company tauted their new product as the best in the market.
meanings.sent2: She tauted her skills to impress the hiring manager.
meanings.sent3: The magician tauted his amazing tricks to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The artist tauted her masterpiece to the world.
meanings.sent5: The chef tauted the delicious flavors of his signature dish.

meanings.definition: To mention or talk about (something) as being very good or desirable.
meanings.sent1: He tauted the benefits of regular exercise to his friends.
meanings.sent2: The blogger tauted the benefits of using natural skincare products.
meanings.sent3: The students tauted the idea of having a pizza party for the class.
meanings.sent4: The coach tauted the importance of teamwork to the players.
meanings.sent5: The teacher tauted the benefits of reading books to her students.
